div.p: No. 2941, pp. 1046-7, unit 70, VPRS 1187/P, outward registered correspondence, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office of Victoria.

Document is a circular (p. 1046) to the heads of 11 departments (listed p. 1047) within the Chief Secretary’s Department, the addressee being added in each case as appropriate. 5 August [18]85.
editorial addition.

I have the honour to inform you that the Public Service Board has exempted you, under the provisions of Clause 5 of the Regulations of the 31st December last, from entering in attendance books the time of your arrival at and departure from your office.

div.p: I have the honor to be,
